name: Courier (Ludum Dare 46)
description:
It’s a difficult and dangerous time in the yard. A lot of people suffer and need help.

Your friend is seriously injured! He urgently needs to deliver the heart (equipment) for the operation! But it's not that simple ...

There is a problem:
You have little time, the container’s charge will not last long. You can find a battery that will extend the performance of the container. It will not be easy, because the enemy military will interfere with you.

Be careful and deliver the package!
